doc.field: 13 HA with guests at Villa La Pietra
13 HA with guests at Villa La Pietra

HA in the gardens of Villa La Pietra as a page (with his brother WA) in a wedding photograph at the marriage of Louise Gaylord with Walter Dillingham. Wedding guests included Mrs Gerritt Wilder, Gov. and Mrs George Carter, Mr and Mrs. Von Holt,(under obelisk) John Miller, best man, next to Italia Blair de Soriano, Louise's cousin and matron of honour, AA and HMA(next to Italia), Margaret Hamill, bridesmaid(next to HMA), Monsieur and Madame Max Henraux, Polly and Harry MacFarlane, Olive Olga Ogelsby, Louise's godmother, Mrs Albert Spalding, mother of the famous violinist, Dr Charles Adams, Louise's step-father, and her mother Bess Adams(fourth from the right), and Mr and Mrs Potter Palmer, the famous art collectors of Chicago May
